data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I was wearing my favourite pumps. I managed to walk through diesel  and get it on the sole of one pump and leave footprints all over my friend's carpet. It's impossible to get out. Even worse than petrol.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: My friend asked me to post a letter. I said no. I didn't expect it to send her into a rage and make her stamp her feet.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: I went to the Empire comedy club. They still have the old performing organ from when it was a dance hall. i wanted to play the organ, but they said no and I wanted to comply with their rules.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: I am waiting for a payment for a quilt I made, based on existential pinciples - I used colours to reflect what it means to exist. But I worry that it's too dark and suggests gloom rather than joy.
